title: Post-functionalization of triamino-phenazinium dyes to reach near-infrared emission
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19257-19263
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03245D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tatiana Munteanu, Jean-François Longevial, Gabriel Canard, Denis Jacquemin, Simon Pascal, Olivier Siri
We showed the possibility of redshifting the absorption and emission properties of triamino-phenazinium fluorophores by a one step post-synthesis strategy, involving the introduction of an electron-withdrawing group.
